problem.markdown:
1. The important characteristics of the fluid used in Circuit Breaker are :-
() It should have good thermal and chemical stability () Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity () It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguishing ability (x) All
2. The main function of substations are
() To decrease the voltage to a value appropriate for local distribution () To receive energy transmitted at high voltage from the generating stations () To provide switching facilities (x) All
3. The advantage of using oil in Oil Circuit Breaker as an arc quenching medium is:
(x) It has high dielectric strength and as a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property () Highly inflammable () It has high dielectric strength () As a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property
4. Aluminium has _______ the resistivity of copper.
() 24 times () 12 times () 3 times (x) 16 times
5. Instrument Transformer are used because
() It provides more safety () It is cheap () It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits (x) Both it provides more safety and it is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
problem.p: 1. The important characteristics of the fluid used in Circuit Breaker are :-

choicegroup.choice: It should have good thermal and chemical stability
Non- inflammability and high thermal conductivity
It should have high dielectric strength and are extinguishing ability

problem.p: 2. The main function of substations are

choicegroup.choice: To decrease the voltage to a value appropriate for local distribution
To receive energy transmitted at high voltage from the generating stations

problem.p: 3. The advantage of using oil in Oil Circuit Breaker as an arc quenching medium is:

choicegroup.choice: It has high dielectric strength and as a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property
As a result of decomposition of oil, it has good cooling property

problem.p: 4. Aluminium has _______ the resistivity of copper.

choicegroup.choice: It is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
Both it provides more safety and it is not practicable to connect instruments and meters directly to the lines in high voltage circuits
